American Cranberry Exchange. Eatmor [sic] Cranberries; Tasty Ways to Serve the Tonic Fruit. New York, NY: American Cranberry Exchange, undated.
American Cranberry Exchange. Eatmor Cranberries Tasty Ways to Serve the Tonic Fruit. New York, NY: American Cranberry Exchange, undated.
American Cranberry Exchange. Eatmor [sic] Cranberries; 44 Ways to Serve the Tasty Fruit. New York, NY: American Cranberry Exchange, undated.
Cranberry Canners, Inc. "6 Ways to Serve Ocean Spray Cranberry Sauce." South Hanson, MA: Cranberry Canners, Inc., undated.
Indian Trail Foods, Inc. Quick Frozen Cranberry with Orange. Wisconsin Rapids, WI: Indian Trail Foods, Inc., undated.
National Cranberry Association (Ocean Spray). 20 Famous Cranberry Dishes. from Famous American Eating Places. Place of publication unknown: National Cranberry Association, undated.
New England Cranberry Sales Company. Cranberry Receipt Book. Place of publication unknown: New England Cranberry Sales Company, circa 1910.
